languages.text: "Однако прежде чем я покину вас, {name}..." {n}Хейнрикс извлекает на свет небольшой прибор, завернутый в бархатную ткань.{/n} "Я должен был передать это устройство Леди Теодоре, однако в сложившихся обстоятельствах считаю необходимым предоставить его вам. Это Толкователь — священная машина, способная переводить языки отдаленных и утраченных миров на низкий готик. В определенной мере он справляется даже с ксеносскими языками — не без огрехов, но достаточно сносно".

traits.locale_text: "Однако прежде чем я покину вас, {name}..." {n}Хейнрикс извлекает на свет небольшой прибор, завернутый в бархатную ткань.{/n} "Я должен был передать это устройство Леди Теодоре, однако в сложившихся обстоятельствах считаю необходимым предоставить его вам. Это Толкователь — священная машина, способная переводить языки отдаленных и утраченных миров на низкий готик. В определенной мере он справляется даже с ксеносскими языками — не без огрехов, но достаточно сносно".

languages.text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."
languages.original_text: "Однако прежде чем я покину вас, {name}..." {n}Хейнрикс извлекает на свет небольшой прибор, завернутый в бархатную ткань.{/n} "Я должен был передать это устройство Леди Теодоре, однако в сложившихся обстоятельствах считаю необходимым предоставить его вам. Это Толкователь — священная машина, способная переводить языки отдаленных и утраченных миров на низкий готик. В определенной мере он справляется даже с ксеносскими языками — не без огрехов, но достаточно сносно".

traits.locale_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in a velvet cloth.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances I am giving it to you. This is an Interpreter— a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xeno languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

"But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in a velvet cloth.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances I am giving it to you. This is an Interpreter— a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xeno languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

"But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

"But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

languages.text: «Pero antes de que nos separemos, {name}...». {n}Heinrix saca un pequeño dispositivo envuelto en terciopelo.{/n} «Se suponía que debía entregar esto a Lady Theodora, pero dadas las circunstancias se lo daré a usted. Es un Dilucidador, una máquina sagrada que traduce los idiomas de tierras lejanas y olvidadas a Gótico Imperial. Hasta funciona con lenguas xenos, aproximadamente. La traducción no será perfecta, pero el significado general debería quedar claro».
languages.original_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

traits.locale_text: «Pero antes de que nos separemos, {name}...». {n}Heinrix saca un pequeño dispositivo envuelto en terciopelo.{/n} «Se suponía que debía entregar esto a Lady Theodora, pero dadas las circunstancias se lo daré a usted. Es un Dilucidador, una máquina sagrada que traduce los idiomas de tierras lejanas y olvidadas a Gótico Imperial. Hasta funciona con lenguas xenos, aproximadamente. La traducción no será perfecta, pero el significado general debería quedar claro».

languages.text: “但在我离开之前，{name}……”{n}海因里希拿出一台用天鹅绒包裹起来的小型装置。{/n}“我本该把这台装置交给西奥多拉夫人，但考虑到现在的情况，我应该把它交给你。这是一台阐释器。这台神圣的机器可以将遥远、迷失世界中的语言翻译成帝国哥特语，甚至可以在一定程度上处理异形的语言。尽管翻译过程可能会有瑕疵，但大体意思应该是很清楚的。”
languages.original_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

traits.locale_text: “但在我离开之前，{name}……”{n}海因里希拿出一台用天鹅绒包裹起来的小型装置。{/n}“我本该把这台装置交给西奥多拉夫人，但考虑到现在的情况，我应该把它交给你。这是一台阐释器。这台神圣的机器可以将遥远、迷失世界中的语言翻译成帝国哥特语，甚至可以在一定程度上处理异形的语言。尽管翻译过程可能会有瑕疵，但大体意思应该是很清楚的。”

languages.text: 「ですが、{name}さん、別れの前に…」{n}ハインリックスはベルベットで包まれた小さな装置を取り出した。{/n}「これをシオドーラ様に届ける予定でしたが、状況を考えて陛下にお渡ししましょう。これはエルシデイター…遠い惑星や失われた惑星の言語を帝国語に翻訳する神聖な装置です。ある程度なら異種族の言語も扱えます。翻訳に欠陥があるかもしれませんが、全体的な意味は分かるはずです」
languages.original_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、{name}さん、別れの前に…」{n}ハインリックスはベルベットで包まれた小さな装置を取り出した。{/n}「これをシオドーラ様に届ける予定でしたが、状況を考えて陛下にお渡ししましょう。これはエルシデイター…遠い惑星や失われた惑星の言語を帝国語に翻訳する神聖な装置です。ある程度なら異種族の言語も扱えます。翻訳に欠陥があるかもしれませんが、全体的な意味は分かるはずです」

languages.text: "Aber bevor ich Euch verlasse, {name} ..." {n}Heinrix holt ein kleines Gerät hervor, das in Samt eingeschlagen ist.{/n} "Das hier sollte ich Lady Theodora überreichen, aber angesichts der Umstände sollt Ihr es nun haben. Es ist ein Elucidator – eine heilige Maschine, die die Sprachen entfernter und verlorener Welten in imperiales Gotisch übersetzt. Sie kommt in begrenztem Rahmen sogar mit Xenos-Sprachen zurecht – die Übersetzung ist nicht perfekt, aber es sollte klar werden, was im Groben gemeint ist."
languages.original_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

traits.locale_text: "Aber bevor ich Euch verlasse, {name} ..." {n}Heinrix holt ein kleines Gerät hervor, das in Samt eingeschlagen ist.{/n} "Das hier sollte ich Lady Theodora überreichen, aber angesichts der Umstände sollt Ihr es nun haben. Es ist ein Elucidator – eine heilige Maschine, die die Sprachen entfernter und verlorener Welten in imperiales Gotisch übersetzt. Sie kommt in begrenztem Rahmen sogar mit Xenos-Sprachen zurecht – die Übersetzung ist nicht perfekt, aber es sollte klar werden, was im Groben gemeint ist."

languages.text: « Avant de partir, cependant... Je devais remettre ceci à dame Théodora, {n}déclare Heinrix en sortant un petit appareil enveloppé dans du velours,{/n} mais étant donné les circonstances, c'est à vous qu'il revient. Il s'agit d'un élucidateur, une machine sacrée capable de traduire les langues des mondes lointains et perdus en gothique impérial. Il fonctionne même avec les langages xénos, dans une certaine mesure. La traduction ne sera certainement pas parfaite, mais elle vous permettra de saisir le sens global. »
languages.original_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

traits.locale_text: « Avant de partir, cependant... Je devais remettre ceci à dame Théodora, {n}déclare Heinrix en sortant un petit appareil enveloppé dans du velours,{/n} mais étant donné les circonstances, c'est à vous qu'il revient. Il s'agit d'un élucidateur, une machine sacrée capable de traduire les langues des mondes lointains et perdus en gothique impérial. Il fonctionne même avec les langages xénos, dans une certaine mesure. La traduction ne sera certainement pas parfaite, mais elle vous permettra de saisir le sens global. »

languages.text: "{name}, gitmeden önce..." {n}Heinrix sana kadifeye sarılı küçük bir aygıt gösteriyor.{/n} "Bunu Leydi Theodora'ya teslim edecektim lakin içinde bulunduğumuz koşullar sebebiyle sana vermeye karar verdim. Bu bir Aydınlatıcı, uzak ve yitik dünyaların dillerini İmparatorluk Gotik lisanına çevirebilen kutsal bir makinedir. Bir ölçüye kadar zeno dillerini bile çevirebilir. Çeviride kusurlar olabilir ama genel olarak anlam sapması yaşanmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "But before I leave you, {name}..." {n}Heinrix produces a small device wrapped in velvet.{/n} "I was supposed to deliver this to Lady Theodora, but considering the circumstances, I am giving it to you. This is an Elucidator — a sacred machine that can translate the languages of distant and lost worlds to Imperial Gothic. It is even capable of handling xenos languages, up to a point — there may be flaws in translation, but the overall meaning should be clear."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, gitmeden önce..." {n}Heinrix sana kadifeye sarılı küçük bir aygıt gösteriyor.{/n} "Bunu Leydi Theodora'ya teslim etmem gerekiyordu ama içinde bulunduğumuz durumu değerlendirdim ve sana vermeye karar verdim. Bu bir Aydınlatıcı, İmparatorluk Gotik dilini unutmuş uzak dünyaların dilinin çevirisini yapabilen kutsal bir makine. Bir ölçüye kadar zeno dillerini bile çevirebiliyor. Çeviride kusurlar olabilir ama genel olarak anlam sapması yaşanmaması gerek."
